name: llm-router-release
description: Centralized management system for routing LLM inference nodes across multiple machines.

scripts.build: npm run build:router && npm run build:node
scripts.build:node: cd node && cmake -B build -S . && cmake --build build --config Release
scripts.build:node:clean: cd node && rm -rf build && cmake -B build -S . && cmake --build build --config Release
scripts.build:node:coverage: cd node && rm -rf build && cmake -B build -S . -DBUILD_TESTS=ON -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS='--coverage' -DCMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS='--coverage' && cmake --build build --config Release
